page.shortlink: api client api number tofraction method

argument.name: denominator
argument.description: The denominator to use in the fraction. If no value (or zero) is passed in then the lowest common denominator is used.

return.name: value
return.description: A string with the fractional representation of the number.

page.description: Extension to the native number variable to convert a number into a fractional.
page.example: var num = 10.45; var numStr = num.toFraction(); // numStr = '10 9/20'
